name: Standard Pass
jpDetails:
Set Contents
• 10 Phantom Pass levels
This increases your current Phantom Pass level by 10.
• Coffee Aid x5
• [Bonus] Meta Jewel x600
• [Bonus] White Street Outfit x1 (Protagonist-exclusive outfit preset)
• [Bonus] Crystal Clear x1 (avatar frame)

Item Distribution Time
• Set Contents: Can be claimed immediately after purchase is complete.

Important Notes
• Note that your Phantom Pass level won't increase if you have already reached the maximum level—even if you purchase the Phantom Pass Upgrade.
• Be aware that any Phantom Pass level rewards you do not attain will be forfeit, even if you have not claimed all the rewards.
• In the event that you change devices or transfer your data to a different operating system, your Phantom Pass Upgrade purchase information will carry over, and can continue attempting to receive premium rewards.
• The above outfits and avatar frames in this set may become available in the future.
Text1: AAAAAA==

name: Premium Pass
jpDetails:
Set Contents
• Unlock Premium Phantom Pass rewards
This allows you to obtain premium rewards based on your Phantom Pass level for this season.
• [Bonus] Meta Jewel x650

Item Distribution Time
• Set Contents: Can be claimed immediately after your purchase is complete.
• Premium Phantom Pass rewards: After your purchase is complete, your Phantom Pass level will increase based on your accumulated pass EXP for this season, and you will be able to claim rewards from the Phantom Pass Rewards screen.
* Reward content details and pass EXP needed to level up your Phantom Pass can be checked from the Phantom Pass Rewards screen.

Important Notes
• Premium Phantom Pass rewards can only be unlocked for the season in which this set is purchased.
• Pass EXP accumulated in this season prior to purchasing a Premium Phantom Pass will count toward unlocking rewards.
• Unclaimed Premium Phantom Pass rewards will be sent to your in-game mailbox at the beginning of the next season, based on the level you reached in this season. Rewards sent to your in-game mailbox will available for 30 days from when they were sent.
• Be aware that any Phantom Pass level rewards you do not attain will be forfeit, even if you have not claimed all the rewards.
• In the event that you change devices or transfer your data to a different operating system, your Phantom Pass Upgrade purchase information will carry over, and can continue attempting to receive premium rewards.
Text1:
Unlock <color=#FFE500>premium rewards</color>
and instantly get <color=#FFE500>650</color> Meta Jewels!

name: Standard Pass
jpDetails:
Set Contents
• +10 Phantom Pass levels
This increases your current Phantom Pass level by 10.
• Coffee Aid x5
• [Bonus] Meta Jewel x600
• [Bonus] Spray-On Dye x1
• [Bonus] Pink Shell Outfit x1 (protagonist-exclusive outfit set)
• [Bonus] Through the Seasons x1 (avatar frame)
• [Bonus] Forerunner x1 (profile design)

Item Distribution Time
• Set Contents: Can be claimed immediately after purchase is complete.

Important Notes
• Note that your Phantom Pass level won't increase if you have already reached the maximum level—even if you purchase the Phantom Pass Upgrade.
• Be aware that any Phantom Pass level rewards you do not attain will be forfeit, even if you have not claimed all the rewards.
• In the event that you change devices or transfer your data to a different operating system, your Phantom Pass Upgrade purchase information will carry over, and you can continue attempting to receive premium rewards.
• Spray-On Dye can be used to unlock color variants of the protagonist-exclusive outfit, Pink Shell Outfit.
• More items that can be unlocked with Spray-On Dye will be added in future updates.
• The above outfits, avatar frames and profile designs in this set may become available in the future.

name: Standard Pass
jpDetails:
Set Contents
• +10 Phantom Pass levels
This increases your current Phantom Pass level by 10.
• Coffee Aid x5
• [Bonus] Meta Jewel x600
• [Bonus] Crossroads of Fate: Twins Arc x1 (Thieves Den illustration)
• [Bonus] New Year's Blessings! x1 (Thieves Den illustration)
• [Bonus] Spray-On Dye x1
• [Bonus] Light Blue Artsy Outfit x1 (protagonist-exclusive outfit set)
• [Bonus] Pop of Color x1 (avatar frame)
• [Bonus] Graffiti Days x1 (profile design)

Item Distribution Time
• Set Contents: Can be claimed immediately after purchase is complete.

Important Notes
• Note that your Phantom Pass level won't increase if you have already reached the maximum level—even if you purchase the Phantom Pass Upgrade.
• Be aware that any Phantom Pass level rewards you do not attain will be forfeit, even if you have not claimed all the rewards.
• In the event that you change devices or transfer your data to a different operating system, your Phantom Pass Upgrade purchase information will carry over, and you can continue attempting to receive premium rewards.
• You can check the effects of the Thieves Den illustration by viewing Thieves Den > Collection > Gallery.
• Spray-On Dye can be used to unlock color variants of certain protagonist-exclusive outfits.
• The above outfits, avatar frames and profile designs in this set may become available again in the future.

• Set contents: Can be claimed immediately after your purchase is complete.
• Premium Phantom Pass rewards: After your purchase is complete, your Phantom Pass level will increase based on your accumulated pass EXP for this season, and you will be able to claim rewards from the Phantom Pass Rewards screen.
* Reward content details and pass EXP needed to level up your Phantom Pass can be checked from the Phantom Pass Rewards screen.

Important Notes
• Premium Phantom Pass rewards can only be unlocked for the season in which this set is purchased.
• Pass EXP accumulated in this season prior to purchasing a Premium Phantom Pass will count toward unlocking rewards.
• Unclaimed Premium Phantom Pass rewards will be sent to your in-game mailbox at the beginning of the next season, based on the level you reached in this season. Rewards sent to your in-game mailbox will available for 30 days from when they were sent.
• Be aware that any Phantom Pass level rewards you do not attain will be forfeit, even if you have not claimed all the rewards.
• In the event that you change devices or transfer your data to a different operating system, your Phantom Pass Upgrade purchase information will carry over, and you can continue attempting to receive premium rewards.

Unlock <color=#FFE500>premium rewards</color>
and instantly get <color=#FFE500>650</color> Meta Jewels!

• Note that your Phantom Pass level won't increase if you have already reached the maximum level—even if you purchase a Premium+ Phantom Pass.
